name: Demon Will & Getting Started
description: $(item)Demon Will$() is your gateway into Blood Magic. Once you have gathered some with a $(l:demon_will/soulsnare)$(item)Soul Snare$(/l), you will be able to craft your first $(l:alchemy_array/arcaneash)$(item)Arcane Ashes$(), a $(l:demon_will/soulgem)$(item)Petty Tartaric Gem$() and a $(l:demon_will/sentientsword)$(item)Sentient Sword$(/l)$().
